mapper.select:
SELECT kd.kingdomsno, kingdomsnm, capital, founder, foundyear, fallyear, COUNT(ge.generalno) AS kingdomscnt
FROM tk_m_kingdoms kd
LEFT JOIN tk_m_general ge ON ge.kingdomsno = kd.kingdomsno
GROUP BY kd.kingdomsno, kingdomsnm, capital, founder, foundyear, fallyear
ORDER BY kd.kingdomsno ASC
